item.title: Fanworks Recommender System Overview
item.description: Overview Fans who want to read fanfiction, watch fanvids, listen to podfics (audio books of fanfiction) or read meta will invariably find themselves at the massive, community supported, volunteer run Archive of Our Own (or AO3). This Hugo award winning open-source based website archives over 6 million fanworks, for over 5 million registered users in 35 thousand fandoms. As a community run and community focused non-profit it does a stellar job of its primary function which is saving and collating amatuer works.
